education.degree: Bachelor of Technology, Artificial Intelligence, Engineering, Computer Science

experience.title: AI/ML Engineer
experience.summary: Led a four-person team to design and implement a 3D Chatbot Avatar system, integrating AI-driven personalization for 100+ daily users and enhancing engagement by 15%. Developed real-time 3D rendering and conversation pipelines using Three.js and Azure TTS/STT, reducing load times by 27% while ensuring smooth data processing. Implemented prompt-engineered techniques to tailor user experiences through applied machine learning, contributing to increased user retention by 15%.

experience.title: Associate AI Engineer

Engineered a barcode scanning dashboard incorporating predictive analytics and ETL pipelines to optimize hospital supply chains, reducing stock-outs by 40%. Deployed scalable machine learning applications using Python, Flask, and Docker Swarm, ensuring robust infrastructure and high-quality code production.
